messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Our objectives are incredible!
Too incredible for me to understand!I’ll fight blindly to defend them,
and your intrusion won’t be forgiven!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT: What was I fighting for, again?
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
What do you have against taking
Pokémon from others?Look in any field or forest!
Those things aren’t exactly rare!
